mriSimBrainModel.name: mriSim brain model
mriSimBrainModel.description: Data from mriSim `Generated.mat` with MRSTAT data from clinical study. Data includes T1, T2 and PD maps of the brain.

MRiLabBrainHighRes.name: MRiLab high resolution brain model
MRiLabBrainHighRes.description: High resolution brain model from MRiLab. Data includes T1, T2, T2* and PD maps of the brain.
